title: Starfield's start screen is not minimal because the team didn't care, insists Bethesda
description: "Having an opinion is one thing. Questioning a developer’s 'care' because you would have done it different is highly unprofessional"

title: I love podcasts passionately, which is why this is my must-have app
description: Overcast is hands down the best iOS app for podcasts

title: Call of Duty loses one of its longest-serving developers as David Vonderhaar leaves Treyarch
description: The developer thanked both their colleagues and the community for their support over the last 18 years and is moving on to an "undisclosed project" elsewhere.

title: Hideo Kojima shares a picture of Keanu Reeves and Norman Reedus, sparking Death Stranding 2 rumors
description: Though the candid shots could just show biking pals out for a ride, Kojima has trolled us for years by giving us peeks of his all-star cast years before they're formally announced.

title: You know what my Oculus Quest 2 setup needs? More weird controller attachments
description: The HelloReal putter for the Oculus Quest 2 has shown me that VR controller attachments are way better than I realized.

title: The Apple Vision Pro could pack in more storage than the iPhone 15
description: The Vision Pro will apparently be available in a 1TB configuration, though other options may be offered.

title: The Boys season 4: everything we know so far
description: The Boys season 4 is coming to Prime Video – here's everything you need to know before it's released.

title: Google Pixel 8 leak shows off its revamped Camera app
description: It sounds like the upcoming Google flagship will also bring with it an updated version of the built-in Camera app.
